# init(url:)

**Initializer**

Initializes the receiver with a URL for the store.

## Declaration

```swift
init(url: URL)
```

## Parameters

- **url**: Location for the store.

## Return Value

Initialized [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPersistentStoreDescription] configured with the given URL.
title: init(url:)
